QuestData.Title: At Our Doorstep
QuestData.Description: The night elves have taught us much during this time, $n. They've taught us who we are and where we come from.$B$BThanks to them... thanks to this place... we're no longer mere beasts. We have regained free will.$B$BThe Forsaken aren't here for our land alone.$B$BThey're looking for something we possess. An artifact capable of uncontrollably spreading the Curse to all humanity. We cannot let them find it.$B$BSylvanas's banshees have come very close. Help my trackers take them out.
QuestData.RewardText: You are as good as I remember, $n. It is good to have you back.
